data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Over 92.34 percent of the people of Nuwara Eliya are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 2 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Yamannu people might believe through him.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Nuwara Eliya, Sri Lanka need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2 believers in Nuwara Eliya to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 27,498 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Nuwara Eliya
location.people_groups_list: Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Bania, Vellidura, Paraiyan (Hindu traditions), Tondagattan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Bania (16,000), Vellidura (1,200), Paraiyan (Hindu traditions) (102,000), Tondagattan (1,500)
